{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-27T21:24:17.000Z", "description": "

Title: Entry Level Software Engineer

 

Job Description

Geek? Nerd? Learn a programming language before you learned a foreign language? You are in good company and we\u2019d like to talk to you. Come geek out with us and make a difference while you learn. We have a scrappy startup feel, with large company benefits and security.

 

Our Ideal Candidate

We are looking for a passionate and tech knowledge hungry entry level software engineer that can grow with us. The ideal candidate will have early career programming skills and be proficient in one or more of the following languages: C#, C++, Java. Maybe some ASP.NET, javascript/html/css sprinkled in. The individual participates in all phases of the software development and delivery process.

 

We are looking for entry level C# Web developers with the following qualifications:

Entry Level Software Engineer Responsibilities

  • Learn the technologies, languages, and practices used by the team.
  • Develop SaaS solutions in .NET, C#, SQL, Angular and various API libraries.
  • Participate in Scrum activities.
  • Participate in code reviews.
  • Work as part of the Scrum team or with the ability to act independently as needed.
  • Collaborate and communicate effectively with team members and other departments within the company.
  • Ensure assigned technical tasks are being delivered on time and with quality.
  • Provide production support and debugging for our production applications.

Entry Level Software Engineer Qualifications

\u00b7      College degree (Associates or Bachelors)

\u00b7      Demonstratable history of curiosity and innovation

\u00b7      Strong desire to learn to code \u2013 No prior professional experience required.

\u00b7      A natural problem solver

\u00b7      Strong communication and interpersonal skills

\u00b7      Must be authorized to work in the US (US Citizen or Green Card holder)

\u00b7      Agile development of SaaS solutions (Preferred)


About us

GSM is on a mission to make the workplace and the environment safer by simplifying compliance and chemical product documentation.

With roots as a regulatory professional services provider for the chemical industry, GSM developed a transformational approach to SDS authoring that focused on a limited universe of chemical hazards rather than chemical ingredients, avoiding the need to review a potentially infinite number of ingredient combinations. Our team consists of regulatory compliance experts that are ready to support you and your unique needs.

Compensation and Benefits

Competitive salaries and excellent benefits are provided after a minimum waiting period. Some of our benefits include 401k, vacation, paid holidays comprehensive health and dental plan, company paid short & long term disability, and life insurance! Join our team in Tampa, FL for a rewarding career!

Global Safety Management is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and values the ways in which we are different. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, veteran status, or other characteristic protected by applicable law.
